name: terraformEnterprise
description: A Task for Terraform Enterprise to manage workspaces, run plan, and apply
author: HashiCorp

inputs.name: command
inputs.label: Command
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Terraform API command to call

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: URL of API Endpoint
inputs.helpMarkDown: Url of Terraform Cloud or Terraform Enterprise. Defaults to https://app.terraform.io/api/v2/.

inputs.name: organization
inputs.label: Terraform Organization
inputs.helpMarkDown: Organization for command to be run against.

inputs.name: token
inputs.label: Terraform API Token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Token to authenticate to Terraform API.

inputs.name: skipcertcheck
inputs.label: Skip Certificate Validation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if Terraform API certificate validation should be enabled..

inputs.name: workspace
inputs.label: Name of Workspace
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of Workspace.
inputs.visibleRule: command = lookup || command = workspace || runCommand = create

inputs.name: lookupCommand
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take.

inputs.name: workspaceCommand
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take.

inputs.name: workspaceautoapply
inputs.label: Auto Apply
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if a run should automatically trigger an Apply.

inputs.name: workspacedescription
inputs.label: Description
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional description for workspace.

inputs.name: workspacefiletriggeresenabled
inputs.label: File Triggers Enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if File Triggeres should be enabled.

inputs.name: workspacequeueallruns
inputs.label: Queue All Runs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if all runs should be queued.

inputs.name: workspacespeculativeenabled
inputs.label: Speculative Enabled
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if speculative runs should be disabled.

inputs.name: workspaceterraformversion
inputs.label: Terraform Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional version of Terraform to use, default is latest when workspace is created.

inputs.name: workspacetriggerprefixes
inputs.label: Trigger Prefixes
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional array of prefixes for Run triggers.

inputs.name: workspaceworkingdirectory
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Directory relative to repository root to execute Terraform commands.

inputs.name: workspacevcsrepo
inputs.label: Use VCS Repo
inputs.helpMarkDown: Boolean to allow configuration of VCS repo for workspace.

inputs.name: vcsrepooauthtokenid
inputs.label: Oauth Token Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional Oauth Token Id to reach VCS repo.

inputs.name: vcsrepobranch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional Branch to use of VCS repo. Will default to master.

inputs.name: vcsrepoingesssubmodules
inputs.label: Ingess Submodules
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if Terraform should ingess submodules in addtion to the root module.

inputs.name: vcsrepoidentifier
inputs.label: Identifier
inputs.helpMarkDown: Identifier of VCS repo.

inputs.name: runCommand
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: Action to take.

inputs.name: runisdestroy
inputs.label: Is Destroy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Toggle if Destroy plan should be generated.

inputs.name: runmessage
inputs.label: Message
inputs.helpMarkDown: Message to attach to run.

inputs.name: runconfiguversion
inputs.label: Configuration Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: Configuration Version for run.

inputs.name: runid
inputs.label: Run Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: Run Id to be applied.

inputs.name: runapplycomment
inputs.label: Apply Comment
inputs.helpMarkDown: Comment to attach to apply.
